fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm energy tariff calculator renders with Debug Toolbar
fields.request_details: Enable the Django Debug Toolbar in the console and open http://10.42.0.1:8888/awg/energy-tariff/. Verify the page loads without raising an AttributeError and the toolbar's Templates panel lists awg/energy_tariff_calculator.html after submitting a sample kWh value.
